conbody.p: MapReduce executoroverviewexecutorsMapReduceThe MapReduce executor triggers a MapReduce job in HDFS or MapR FS each time it receives an event record. Use the MapReduce executor as part of an event stream in the pipeline. Jarcec: aay "in HDFS" or HDFS or MapR FS? Use the MapReduce executor to process files from Hadoop

You can use the MapReduce executor to trigger custom jobs that you define in the stage, jobs based on a specified configuration object, or a predefined job that converts Avro files to Parquet. Note that MapReduce executor does not monitor jobs.

When you configure the MapReduce executor, you specify connection information and job details. When using the Avro to Parquet job, you specify details such as the output file directory and optional compression codec.
You can also configure the executor to generate events for another event stream. For more information about event handling, see .
